channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: @Neil_Sarg @madebygoogle @GoogleUK @Google lovely image.
item.source:markdown: @Neil_Sarg @madebygoogle @GoogleUK @Google lovely image.

item.description: @KevinCTofel Wake me up when you do some film photography. ;) Extra points if you develop the film yourself, and a bonus for making prints. Just kidding: I got rid of my darkroom several years ago. My DSLRs and cameras have been gathering dust. My Pixel 6 captures amazing images.
item.source:markdown: @KevinCTofel Wake me up when you do some film photography. ;) Extra points if you develop the film yourself, and a bonus for making prints. Just kidding: I got rid of my darkroom several years ago. My DSLRs and cameras have been gathering dust. My Pixel 6 captures amazing images.

item.description: @nocontextzine I have not checked in on Ello for a long time. Time to try it again.
item.source:markdown: @nocontextzine I have not checked in on Ello for a long time. Time to try it again.

item.description: @SeamusBlackley Would YOU take metaverse advice from a BAKER? ;)

item.description: @RonJeffries The dark side beckons. Be careful.
item.source:markdown: @RonJeffries The dark side beckons. Be careful.

item.description: If you are not following @MayaCPopa your twitter feed has a serious inspirational deficiency. She's my guide to lovely poetry. https://t.co/mCQfKUtR0l

item.description: @Neil_Sarg I held a Pixel 6a yesterday. It's great. Nothing has one substantive advantage vs. 6a: wireless charging. Latest iPhone SE is also decent, and has wireless charging.
item.source:markdown: @Neil_Sarg I held a Pixel 6a yesterday. It's great. Nothing has one substantive advantage vs. 6a: wireless charging. Latest iPhone SE is also decent, and has wireless charging.

item.description: @DrSLMiller @StevenBeschloss I trust Garland to pursue justice. This is a deeply complex situation, it must be handled with strict attention to our laws and constitution.
item.source:markdown: @DrSLMiller @StevenBeschloss I trust Garland to pursue justice. This is a deeply complex situation, it must be handled with strict attention to our laws and constitution.

item.description: Re-upping since @Starbucks has ignored thls store. https://t.co/CN52agszVS

item.description: @featherty @ElieNYC I am deeply concerned. But Garland is a patriot, with an outstanding legal background. Just because we do not YET see evidence of the DOJ investigation and work product, it's reasonable to assume they are preparing for a SUCESSFUL prosecution, an extremely heavy lift.
item.source:markdown: @featherty @ElieNYC I am deeply concerned. But Garland is a patriot, with an outstanding legal background. Just because we do not YET see evidence of the DOJ investigation and work product, it's reasonable to assume they are preparing for a SUCESSFUL prosecution, an extremely heavy lift.
